signature: Closure<E> ifClosure(Predicate<? super E>, Closure<? super E>, Closure<? super E>)

enhanced_by.method_name: switchClosure(Predicate<? super E>[], Closure<? super E>[], Closure<? super E>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve making decisions based on predicates and selecting closures accordingly.
Both methods involve selecting closures based on a decision mechanism, though one uses a map and the other uses predicates.
